name: The Last Fastelavn
description:
Story based point and click adventure game.

You play as the cat, trying to escape the beating at Fastelavn by making someone else take your place. Your plans may not end well... but for who?

Credits:

Camilla - artist https://www.artstation.com/camillalantzring

Laura - artist https://www.instagram.com/dropthatkitten/

Mikkel - programmer https://github.com/mikkelens
